name: Interactive Game Poster (Leon Chen)
description:
Walkthrough of Important Features:

This is a game concept about hatching eggs. When the player clicks on a egg, it will make a noise (which could indicate leveling up). After a certain amount of clicks, the egg will hatch into a random Pokémon. (Either Pichu, Magickarp, Ditto, Eevee, and Jigglypuff). The eggs and Pokémon will also move around to simulate how real pets would wander around and explore the environment. There is background music, as well as level up and hatching sound affects. The eggs also come in different colors, and of random chance, but I was unable to make them hatch into specific Pokémon.

Music: I do not own any of the music. (All music was from the Pokémon games.)

Pokémon Sword and Shield Pokémon Center Theme

Pokémon Level Up Noise

Pokémon Evolution Noise
